website_summaries.verdict: The Keds Midtown Zip Suede WX is a chic meets street kind of sneaker. Built with a weatherized feature, or a Scotchgard protected suede upper in particular, this high-top cleatie footwear protects your feet against water, dirt, and stains.Although limited colors are available, many still perceive it as stylish and, on top of that, affordable, comfortable, and easy to wear. A few downsides, however, include a narrow-fitting toe box and minimal (or lack of, for some) arch support.
pros: The affordable price point of the Keds Midtown Zip Suede WX is an advantageous feature for most purchasers
Many claimed that this shoe is extremely comfortable when worn
The water-resistant upper impressed heaps of purchasers as it makes the shoe perfect for a wet fall and snowy winter
Numerous reviewers stated that they love this cute and stylish Keds shoe
It is an excellent fusion of a cleatie and a sneaker that looks great with casual outfits
A few reviewers said that they like the super soft suede upper of this shoe
The side zipper makes it easy to put on, according to a couple of reviewers
cons: The Keds Midtown Zip Suede WX has limited colorways
Some reviewers had to order a half size larger than their standard size because of this shoe's narrow fit in the toe box
Another purchaser reported that this shoe is not warm enough without thick socks during the coldest days in the winter
A few reviewers had to return their pairs due to lack of arch support

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with these shoes. They fit perfectly (I'm a solid size 7 they fit true to size) and are super comfortable. The fist day I wore them I was on my feet for 11 hours and could not believe my feet felt so good! Huge bonus that they are super cute as well. AND they are waterproof. Perfect for a wet fall and snowy winter.
customer_reviews.author: SandyJanssenBarry

customer_reviews.title: These are great boots, but definitely order up 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots, but definitely order up 1/2 size. They are very narrow in the toe box region, but going up a 1/2 size took care of this. During the coldest days this winter in Ohio, as in below 30 degrees, they were not warm without wool or lambs wool socks, and even then, not for long. They are water resistant, however, and extremely comfortable. Good in snow as long as it isn't slushy or icy. I try to walk outside every day except in the extreme cold, so I just walked down the street instead of on the sidewalks. Our street has very little sidewalk anyway. Hope this helps someone!
customer_reviews.author: notsofast

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: A little on the narrow side, just like most Keds, but I knew the might be so went a half size larger and the fit is good. They are also a lot more comfortable than I remember Keds being....not that they weren't comfortable before, but these have some sort of extra squishy, marshmallow insoles that make them feel like I'm walking on fluffy little kittens. The suede is good quality, soft suede and seems like it will stand the test of time, especially with the Scotchgarde treatment. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Elf.of.Lianion

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because they had the fashion look at a bargain price. I did not know that they were waterproof until I began wearing them. A significant plus in my book. The shoe/bootie is very comfortable and easy to slip on quickly when the dog tells me he wants to go out. In the rain they are indispensable. The fabric used is a velour of some kind that has worn very well and after six months of regular use still looks quite new. I love Kids and couldn't be more pleased with the new fashion look to some of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LL Roth

customer_reviews.title: The boot is nice; just needs some help in the design....
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was to narrow in the toe area, across and the point of the tow. The toe should have been more rounded to go with the boot effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these super cute and stylish shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these super cute and stylish shoes. I ordered a half size larger than what I normally take so that I could fit arch supporting insoles in. I wore these shoes daily until the wet winter weather started showing up on the regular. I'll pull these back out when the warmer and dryer weather shows up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Hilliker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. I love these sneakers are too comfortable and cute. They are not complicated to clean even if their material is cloth. I would buy them a thousand times more.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy, casual Keds
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes. They do run a little narrow, which is fine for my narrow foot. They’re comfortable and cozy AND stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Woods

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 6.5 in every shoe.but I ordered a size 7 and they fit very well. I think I'm going to order some. Arch support inserts for them, because they have no support in that area. But they are very cute and Im happy with them !!
customer_reviews.author: Dara H

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and casual
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for around town. I have a slightly narrower foot and these handle a thicker wool sock with no problem. Work with literally ant pair of pants.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: You need to order one size up! Order than that they are confortable and nice looking
customer_reviews.author: preciosa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for work or play.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I’m a teacher and I could wear them everyday. They look neat with pants or jeans. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Le Miu Miu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Always looking for something easy and stylish! You can wear these anywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, the opening a bit narrow and I have A/M width plus thin legs.
customer_reviews.author: Lucila Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Listened to The Reviews
customer_reviews.text: My sneakers came today and they are very cute. I can't wait to wear them. I normally wear a 7.5 but I ordered an 8 because many of the reviews said they run small. I'm so glad that I ordered the bigger size. The sneakers definitely run, at least, a half size small. The 7.5 would have been too small. I am happy I ordered them because the look very cute but also happy that I ordered the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Rona

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Received item before expecting delivery date, which is always good. I went a 1/2 size up and they fit great. The zipper is a little tricky but all else good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size Cute Keds
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit true to size and are cute. Love them. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: SoniaB

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Midtown Zip Suede WX Sneaker
product_meta.description: The MIDTOWN ZIP grey ankle boots from KEDS is where slouch style is where chic meets street.
feature_bullets: Durable rubber outsole for added comfort
